medical_history.chief_complaint: Acute arterial ischemia after urologic surgery in the high lithotomy position.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient reported right calf pain after surgery. Clinical examination revealed pale and cold right foot and leg with sensory and motor dysfunction, and absent pedal and popliteal pulses.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The patient had several cardiovascular risk factors: active smoking, hypercholesterolemia, diabetes mellitus, and hypertension. He also had a clinical history of severe arteritis and known vascular conditions.
medical_history.social_history: Active smoking noted as a lifestyle factor influencing the patientâ€™s condition.
